full_summary:
======================

### Senior Business Analyst Bid Solicitation

**Public Posting Date**: 2022-10-06
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-24T14:00:00
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category**: Service Procurement

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat seeks a Senior Business Analyst to support the implementation of selected Fixed Asset Review recommendations. The period of the resulting contract will be for twenty-four (24) months, with an option to extend the resulting contract term by up to one (1) additional twelve (12) month period.

### About the Position

The Senior Business Analyst will undertake work related to the implementation of selected Fixed Asset Review recommendations, including:

* Supporting the development of a vision and solutions
* Participating in the overall design of complex business initiatives, such as the development of a real property portfolio strategy, risk assessment, portfolio rationalization, and the reinforcement of information management

### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Methodology

Evaluations will be conducted with fairness in accordance with the evaluation criteria and selection methodology defined in the RFP. The evaluation criteria will be based on the following:

* Technical capacity to deliver services
* Quality of the proposal
* Business acumen
* How the proposal addresses the requirements and expectations outlined in the RFP
* Corporate Social Responsibility (CCR) plan

### Trade Agreements

This bid solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Important Dates

* Public Posting Date: 2022-10-06
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-24T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
